data.title: Releasing a “Snakehead”: An Interview with Evan Jackson Leong
data.meta_description: Known for his documentary Lin-sanity, filmmaker Evan Jackson Leong takes his love of the gangster genre from the likes of both Hollywood and the Far East and crafted his own feature film, Snakehead. The film is now available in select theaters, On Demand, and Digital from Samuel Goldwyn Films. Special Thanks to Katrina Wan PR…
data.text:
Known for his documentary Lin-sanity, filmmaker Evan Jackson Leong takes his love of the gangster genre from the likes of both Hollywood and the Far East and crafted his own feature film, Snakehead. The film is now available in select theaters, On Demand, and Digital from Samuel Goldwyn Films.

Special Thanks to Katrina Wan PR and Evan Jackson Leong for making this interview possible.
